about_the_game:
Unending nightfall has swept across the forest, sending all the animals fleeing from monstrous shapes in the dark!

A last refuge, Light Springs, survives; and now it's time for you to chart the lost paths back into the forest!

Collect and use charms and glyphs of power to make your way through the forest, reconnect villages and help towns-critters as you work to solve the cause of the nightfall.

Features

  • Explore: The forest is dark and filled with danger! Find the safest path for convoys to travel, and uncover long forgotten locations to help your journey!

  • Scout: for nearby enemies and locations in each region. Use your intuition and skills to solve each map.

  • Use: glyph powers to move and defeat enemies. Rolls glyphs against your challengers to unlock better dialogue paths.

  • Customise: Grow your loadout of glyphs, find shrines and quests to make strategic upgrades to them as you travel.

  • Quest: for towns-critters to improve your reputation and build convoys. Find side-quests in the forest for rich rewards.

  • Journey: to different biomes and towns. Different enemies, challenges, and secrets you'll need to uncover to save the forest!
